alert.note: Alert for Okfuskee (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 23 at 11:31PM CDT until September 23 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL OKFUSKEE COUNTY... At 1130 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles north of Yeager to Wewoka, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Bearden... This includes Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 212 and 219. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
